website_summaries.verdict: This model is ideal for beginners, although they may be disappointed with the total ride time. The trolley will handle future upgrades, however.
pros: Shorter zip line at only 40 feet
Trolley also works with thicker and longer cables
Designed to slow down naturally, no brake required
cons: Tree attachment is not always a straightforward task
Younger users may not be able to reach handlebars

customer_reviews.title: Kids super dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I know many people have said this, but 40 feet is a lot shorter than you think. We're returning it for a bigger one. I would reccomend finding the trees, and measuring the distance around each tree, plus the distance between them. We tried, but the wire was just not long enough, because we hadn't measured before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This and locating the best trees/location are the only things that caused the installation ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the package very quickly with Prime shipping. It installed very quickly but did not include a second tree-protecting tubing. This and locating the best trees/location are the only things that caused the installation time to be longer than listed in the manual. We put it at a height lower than recommended because the kids were short. There is already a little slack in the line from using it for hours this weekend, but this doesn't seem to be a huge problem. My kids love it and are highly entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This takes a little bit of ingenuity to install, but was exactly what we wanted for setting up a zip line over a pond. After a couple of days we lost one of the rubber handles but it was more the kids using it than the product itself. It makes for hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fichtner

customer_reviews.title: fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: best outdoor present my kids have ever had. Finally we can compete with the kids with the trampoline. :) kids love it and 6 months in they're still not tired of it. Makes for some fun "double dares" for the adults too!
customer_reviews.author: reviewfan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun outside without the electronics...
customer_reviews.text: This set was pretty easy to set up and very sturdy for my 8 yr old daughter. We put it up to start from 10ft down to 6ft . Since we put it up, she has wanted a longer one now. We have a 100ft zipline now. I was glad to have this set and get it at a good deal. They showed me whether my daughter was going to be interested or not.
customer_reviews.author: Chad1317

customer_reviews.title: We did not have trees to set the zipline so ...
customer_reviews.text: We did not have trees to set the zipline so we really had to do a lot of work but at the end it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Very heavy product materials. Seems to have great workmanship and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Very heavy product materials. Seems to have great workmanship and quality. Yet to install due to current yard remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Ckroger

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up.. May need to build a platform to access depending on how high the wire is attached. Fun. Mom and dad enjoy too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment to our backyard! Keeps kids entertained for hours. But it does require some math/trigonometry to figure out the best way to anchor this if you don’t have huge trees to anchor it.
customer_reviews.author: mcrose

customer_reviews.title: Zipping in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. The kids love sliding down it, won't hold adults, but kids love it! Easy to put up for this novice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids during the dog days of summer
customer_reviews.text: Very fun on the backyard zip line! The kids love it, but for some it goes too fast! This easy to reach sit down zip line flies through the backyard and is gauranteed to satisfy your kids in the dog days of summer!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Walters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends constantly play on this! We are going to order more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this thing. Looking forward to picking up a large diameter steel pipe and some quikrete to make a heavy-duty attachment for this so the parents can join in the fun, too!
customer_reviews.author: Russell J.

customer_reviews.title: A great starter zipline for kids
customer_reviews.text: Forty feet may sound like a long line, but it's a relatively short ride. It's good "beginner" length for kids. It had easy to follow instructions and we had it up pretty quickly. Our four grandchildren (ages 7-9) love it.
customer_reviews.author: NC review

customer_reviews.title: Product was on time and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Product was on time and easy to install.Customer might have to add access on the high end for smaller children. Wished I had got one that was a little longer. My fault, however, the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: skabman25

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. My kids loved this gift. All parts were present. Instructions were easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Bmayo9

customer_reviews.title: Zippy do !!
customer_reviews.text: Can't get my 10 year old granddaughter to stop "zipping" and come inside.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B.

customer_reviews.title: The kids I bought this zipline for love it! It was easy to assemble and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids I bought this zipline for love it! It was easy to assemble and easy to use. Satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren have been kept so busy with this zip line. It became the hit of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Easy to use. Small adults have used it too. So glad we spend the money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was long time waiting for my kids, since it took me a while to find the product. When we got it, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Savina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kids love it and it's easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun.
customer_reviews.text: My children from 6 to 13 love it as do their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids were so sad
customer_reviews.text: Returned for 70' Zipline which comes with length adjusting mechanism that makes secure setup much easier. 40' did not come with this feature, so setup was near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: tothepoint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! Easy to install, less than 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and our son loves it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and our son loves it as does my husband. 40ft isn't that long so you may want to go for a longer cable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKurt

customer_reviews.title: Contents look excellent but it is definitely not for an Arizona back ...
customer_reviews.text: Contents look excellent but it is definitely not for an Arizona back yard - cable tooooo short and need for 3ft round trees may make me laugh but not with a smile - plus I thought I ordered ONE and received AND PAID FOR Three! Since there was no packing slip or willingness to let me return - I am having to try to see to friends and family who also do not have 3 ft round trees and the trees we do have need more than 40 ft of cable. So, no, I'm disappointed. But, as I said the materials and quality of same appear to be great
customer_reviews.author: Sherryn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: We love this! The only issue is that my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! The only issue is that my kids who are 3 and 5 can't reach the handle bars so they have to hold on to the rope. However, it's a hit with the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The PE kiddos loved this during our Ninja Warrior Field Day!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought more cable to make it longer, but the trolley with attached seat are worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Merry E. Pridemore

customer_reviews.title: It was a little more than 30 min instilation. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little more than 30 min instilation. My kid loves it... we hope to make a longer line in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Slackers 40’ Zipline Falcon Series Kit with Seat
product_meta.description: Most agree that zipline kits are one of the most exciting items that you can put in your backyard for hours of enjoyment. Brand 44 ziplines help improve strength and balance all while riding a just a few feet off the ground. Turn your backyard into an extreme adventure park with Brand 44 Ziplines. Includes: 40' galvanized steel cable, fully assembled steel trolley with comfortable rubber grip handles, hardware to attach to 2 trees, instructions.
feature_bullets: Strong Steel Trolley With Sealed Ball Bearings Maximizes The Strength And Speed Of The Ride Allowing For Hours Of Enjoyment
Fully Assembled Trolley And Very Thorough Instructions Decrease The Setup Time So You Will Be Zip lining In 30 Minutes
Smooth And Consistent Speed With A Gradual Stop At The End Allow For The Best Backyard Zip line Ride With No Brakes Needed
Strong steel trolley with sealed ball bearings maximizes the strength and speed of the ride allowing for hours of enjoyment
Fully assembled trolley and very thorough instructions decrease the setup time so you will be ziplining in 30 minutes
Smooth and consistent speed with a gradual stop at the end allow for the best backyard zipline ride with no brakes needed
